title: Drawing, "Design for Potato Peeler", January 17, 1991
medium: Photocopy with graphite and liquid correction fluid printed on off-white wove paper, folded
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite, recto lower margin above title block: (delta symbol) 1 BLADE ASSEMBLY BLOCK REVISED / (delta symbol) 2 DIMENSION CHANGED FROM 48.0 R TO 47.0 R / NOTE: TOP BLADE BLOCK REMOVED (delta symbol) 3 11.5 R to 8. R; printed in title block:   STRAIGHT PEELER  / DRAWN MHC /  SCALE FULL / DATE [in graphite] 1.17.90 / SMART DESIGN INC. / APPROVED [in graphite] REV. 5 [delta symbol] / REVISION [in graphite] (delta symbol) 1.24.91 / DRAWING NUMBER 219.

Inscribed in black marker, verso on Post-It flag with blue tail: GGI / PEELER / 90.
provenance: Smart Design, Inc., New York, NY, prior to 2011
dimensions: 21.4 x 42.6 cm (8 7/16 x 16 3/4 in.), folded (dimensions approximate)
description: Peeler with handle and blade supported by a curved element is seen in full from above and from the side, with additional details at left depicting the blade hole and block in cross-section and, at right, the handle in two different cross-section views.  There are specifications about dimensions of each component throughout. The drawing space is framed by a ruled border and contains a title block in the lower margin, right.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Potato Peeler", January 17, 1991.Photocopy with graphite and liquid correction fluid printed on off-white wove paper, folded. Gift of Smart Design, Inc.. 2011-50-28.
